Stephen Curry scored an incredible buzzer-beater to seal the win for the Golden State Warriors.
The New Orleans Pelicans were missing key player Zion Williamson due to an injury.
Klay Thompson returned to the Warriors lineup and had an impressive performance.
The final score was 120-112 in favor of the Golden State Warriors.
Fans erupted in joy as the Warriors secured their playoff spot with this win.
The players expressed their determination to win the championship this season in a post-game interview.
Warriors' head coach Steve Kerr praised his team's resilience in a press conference.
Many believe that Draymond Green's leadership was pivotal in guiding the Warriors to victory.
The Pelicans struggled defensively throughout the game, leading to their loss.
Some argue that the referees made controversial calls that impacted the game outcome.
